alert.note: Alert for Upper Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:08PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hunterdon, south central Warren, northwestern Somerset and north central Bucks Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 608 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Erwinna, or 16 miles southeast of Easton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington, Tinicum, High Bridge, Clinton, Peapack And Gladstone, Glen Gardner, Hampton, Frenchtown, Lebanon, Milford, Califon, Erwinna, Annandale and White House Station. This includes Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 10 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northern and northwestern New Jersey...and southeastern Pennsylvania.
